item.title: FPGA accelerated Abandoned Object Detection
item.description: Designed a standalone system that uses a novel static background modeling algorithm and identifies any object lying abandoned for a given period of time. Implemented on Xilinx FPGA ZYNQ-ZC702 board. VxWorks used as RTOS to manage the real time processes. Horizontally placed camera on table top in minimally crowded place

item.title: 3B Biometric Security System
item.description: Developed a system prototype using BeagleBone Black and RGB camera for purpose of authorizing access and remote monitoring in Robotics Lab(DTU). The system uses a combination of real-time face recognition and input password to authorize access and monitors student’s activities in lab, and periodically sends these informations to lab-incharge on WhatsApp.

item.title: Robot Navigation system using Xbox Kinect
item.description: Built a navigation system for a robot using OpenCV and OpenKinect libraries, that uses disparity map along with pixel intensity calibration to compute the distance of an object/obstacle from the Xbox Kinect. Generated signals are sent to motor driver circuit that propels the wheel to avoid possible collision with obstacle.

item.title: Comic Polyglot
item.description: Comic Polyglot-A system that identifies the text regions in comic strips like Manga and subsequently translates it’s Japanese text into English using an OCR engine while maintaining the syntax. It is aimed to help English-speaking manga comic readers. [Best Project Award], [Highresolution poster], [Project page] Winter School Poster

item.title: Face Detection & Tracking
item.description: Created a robust algorithm that combines SIFT and CamShift algorithm to detect and track a human face in real time. The tracker correctly tracked face for more than 90 % of frames at 15 FPS on Intel core i5-2450M processor.

item.title: HistExtract
item.description: HistExtract, a system that extracts highly correlated text from historical inscription images. Work featured in ”Digital Heritage” project sponsored by Department of Science & Technology, Govt. of India.
